verbs.description: Willie Nelson , Jessica Chastain and [ARG2: other celebrities] [V: including] [ARG1: Jim Carrey , Jimmy Kimmel and Kumail Nanjiani] are speaking out against Trump 's " zero tolerance " immigration policy .
